title: Drawing, "Project for a Sedan Chair", 1775–90
medium: Black chalk, pen and Chinese ink, brush and yellow, brown, blue, purple, rose watercolors
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
description: Shown in profile, turned toward left, with one bar. Corn cobs stand in the middle and at the corners of the roof, the first one seemingly in a meadow. Tassels hang from the corners. The panel beside the window is decorated with a cord with two tassels hanging over two disks. The lower panels have single blossom rosettes in their upper parts. The left end of the bar is shown; it is without a mounting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a Sedan Chair", 1775–90.
1775–90. Black chalk, pen and Chinese ink, brush and yellow, brown, blue, purple, rose watercolors. Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander. 1900-24-7.
